attributes.action: Do not allow schools / councils to fine parents who live / educate within a tier
attributes.additional_details: The Government is worried about our children and them missing out at school. But these are times that need action. Where we live in a high tier area, do not allow my childrens school to issue a fine. I can keep my children educated / safe from the safety of my own home. A school is risk, unnecessary risk in some situations. Where a parent CAN be at home and CAN educate their children, allow for this during this covid crises.
attributes.background: Do not allow fines to be issued to parents where that school sits within a tiered area of the UK, if its not safe for me to be out, then it's not safe for our children.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065
